meanings.definition: A mineral deposit that rises from the floor of a cave due to the dripping of mineral-rich water.
meanings.sent1: The stalagmite in the cave grew slowly over many years.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to touch the stalagmite in the cave, as it is fragile.
meanings.sent3: The stalagmite in the cave looked like a frozen waterfall.
meanings.sent4: The stalagmite stood tall like a frozen spear in the cave.
meanings.sent5: The gleaming stalagmite in the cave sparkled in the dim light.

meanings.definition: A columnar mass of mineral matter deposited on the floor of a cave by dripping water.
meanings.sent1: Explorers marveled at the size of the stalagmite in the cave.
meanings.sent2: The guide pointed out the stalagmite to the group of tourists.
meanings.sent3: The stalagmite in the cave resembled a frozen tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: The stalagmite's shadow danced on the cave wall in the flickering torchlight.
meanings.sent5: The ancient stalagmite in the cave seemed to guard its underground realm.
